title: Build Realm of Legends Action RPG

requirements.text: Create character creation system with race selection (Human, Elf, Dwarf) and class selection (Warrior, Mage, Ranger) with distinct visual representations and stat modifiers

quotes: Create unique heroes with various races (Human, Elf, Dwarf, etc.) and classes (Warrior, Mage, Ranger, etc.)

acceptanceCriteria: User can select from three races: Human, Elf, Dwarf
User can select from three classes: Warrior, Mage, Ranger
Each race/class combination has distinct base stats
Character data is persisted in backend

requirements.text: Implement character appearance customization interface with options for physical features, hair, skin tone, and equipment appearance

quotes: In-depth character customization options including appearance, skills, and abilities

acceptanceCriteria: User can customize character appearance with multiple options
Appearance choices are reflected in character preview
Customization data is saved with character profile

requirements.text: Build skill tree and ability system where players can allocate skill points and unlock class-specific abilities

quotes: In-depth character customization options including appearance, skills, and abilities

acceptanceCriteria: Each class has unique skill tree with multiple branches
Players can allocate skill points to unlock abilities
Skill allocation is stored and retrievable from backend

requirements.text: Create 3D open world environment using React Three Fiber with diverse biomes (forest, mountain, dungeon, city) that players can explore

quotes: A beautifully crafted open world with diverse environments (forests, mountains, dungeons, and cities)

acceptanceCriteria: 3D world rendered using React Three Fiber
At least four distinct environment types are visually represented
Player character can move through the world
Camera follows player movement

requirements.text: Implement dynamic day-night cycle system that transitions between time periods and affects world lighting

quotes: Dynamic weather and day-night cycle that affect gameplay and NPC interactions

acceptanceCriteria: Smooth day-night transitions with realistic lighting changes
Time of day affects ambient lighting and shadows
Current time state is visible to player

requirements.text: Create dynamic weather system with multiple weather states (clear, rain, storm) that change environmental visuals and affect gameplay

quotes: Dynamic weather and day-night cycle that affect gameplay and NPC interactions

acceptanceCriteria: Weather changes with visual effects (rain particles, clouds)
Weather state affects gameplay mechanics
Weather transitions are smooth and natural

requirements.text: Build real-time combat system with keyboard/touch controls for movement, basic attacks, and ability execution

quotes: Fast-paced, skill-based combat system with responsive controls

acceptanceCriteria: Player can attack enemies in real-time
Combat responds to player input with minimal delay
Health and damage calculations work correctly
Combat state is synchronized with backend

requirements.text: Implement combo attack system where sequential attacks trigger special combo moves with enhanced effects

quotes: Combo moves, special abilities, and ultimate skills

acceptanceCriteria: Consecutive attacks build combo counter
Combo thresholds unlock special moves
Combo counter resets after combat pause
Visual feedback shows combo state

requirements.text: Create special ability system with cooldown timers where players can activate class-specific abilities during combat

quotes: Combo moves, special abilities, and ultimate skills

acceptanceCriteria: Each class has unique special abilities
Abilities have cooldown periods after use
Visual indicators show ability availability
Abilities execute correctly during combat

requirements.text: Implement ultimate skill system with charge meter that fills through combat actions and unleashes powerful class-specific attacks

quotes: Combo moves, special abilities, and ultimate skills

acceptanceCriteria: Ultimate meter fills through combat actions
Ultimate skill can be activated when meter is full
Each class has unique ultimate ability
Visual effects distinguish ultimate from regular abilities

requirements.text: Create main storyline quest system with sequential chapters, quest tracking, objectives, and completion rewards

quotes: Engaging main storyline with side quests that provide depth and encourage exploration

acceptanceCriteria: Main quest line progresses through multiple chapters
Quest objectives are clearly displayed
Quest progress is tracked and persisted
Completing quests grants rewards

requirements.text: Build side quest system with optional missions that provide exploration incentives and additional rewards

quotes: Engaging main storyline with side quests that provide depth and encourage exploration

acceptanceCriteria: Side quests are discoverable in different locations
Side quests are independent from main storyline
Side quest completion grants rewards
Players can track multiple active side quests

requirements.text: Implement choice-driven dialogue system where player decisions affect story outcomes, NPC relationships, and world state

quotes: Choices that impact the world and character relationships

acceptanceCriteria: Players can choose between multiple dialogue options
Choices alter subsequent story events
NPC attitudes change based on player choices
Choice consequences are persistent

requirements.text: Create cooperative multiplayer mode where players can form parties to battle boss enemies together

quotes: Cooperative multiplayer mode for teaming up with friends to tackle tough bosses

acceptanceCriteria: Players can invite others to form party
Party members appear in same combat instance
Boss encounters scale for multiple players
Rewards are distributed to all party members

requirements.text: Build guild system where players can create or join guilds, view member lists, and access guild chat

quotes: Guild system for players to join forces, trade, and participate in guild wars

acceptanceCriteria: Players can create new guilds
Players can search and join existing guilds
Guild member roster is visible
Guild chat functionality works for all members

requirements.text: Implement player-to-player trading system within guilds where members can exchange items and resources

quotes: Guild system for players to join forces, trade, and participate in guild wars

acceptanceCriteria: Guild members can initiate trades with each other
Trade interface shows items being exchanged
Both parties must confirm before trade completes
Trade history is logged

requirements.text: Create guild wars feature where guilds can challenge each other in competitive battles for rewards and rankings

quotes: Guild system for players to join forces, trade, and participate in guild wars

acceptanceCriteria: Guilds can declare war on other guilds
Guild war battleground exists with win conditions
Guild rankings update based on war outcomes
Winning guild receives rewards

requirements.text: Build resource gathering system where players can collect materials from the environment (ore, herbs, wood) during exploration

quotes: Resource gathering and crafting system to create weapons, armor, and potions

acceptanceCriteria: Resource nodes spawn in appropriate environments
Players can interact with nodes to gather resources
Resources are added to player inventory
Resource quantities are tracked

requirements.text: Create crafting system where players can combine resources to create weapons, armor, and potions using recipes

quotes: Resource gathering and crafting system to create weapons, armor, and potions

acceptanceCriteria: Crafting interface displays available recipes
Players can select recipe and see required materials
Crafting consumes resources and produces items
Crafted items appear in player inventory

requirements.text: Implement player-driven marketplace where users can list items for sale, browse listings, and purchase from other players

quotes: Player-driven economy with trading features among players

acceptanceCriteria: Players can list items with set prices
Marketplace displays all active listings
Players can search and filter marketplace
Purchase transactions complete correctly

requirements.text: Build in-app store for cosmetic items, battle passes, and premium membership with secure purchase flow

quotes: Free-to-play model with in-app purchases for cosmetic items, battle passes, and exclusive content

acceptanceCriteria: Store displays available cosmetic items
Battle pass tiers and rewards are visible
Premium membership benefits are clearly shown
Purchase flow integrates with Internet Identity

requirements.text: Create seasonal event system that activates limited-time quests, challenges, and exclusive rewards on a schedule

quotes: Seasonal events and updates to introduce new content, quests, and characters

acceptanceCriteria: Events activate during specified time periods
Event-specific quests appear during active events
Event rewards are unique to that season
Event status is visible in UI

requirements.text: Implement daily rewards system that grants players bonuses for logging in each day with streak tracking

quotes: Daily rewards and loyalty programs to retain players

acceptanceCriteria: Players receive rewards upon daily login
Login streak counter increments each consecutive day
Reward quality increases with streak length
Streak resets if player misses a day

requirements.text: Create in-app challenge system with rotating daily and weekly challenges that reward players for completing specific objectives

quotes: In-app events and challenges to encourage regular play

acceptanceCriteria: Daily challenges refresh every 24 hours
Weekly challenges refresh every 7 days
Challenge progress is tracked in real-time
Completed challenges grant rewards automatically

requirements.text: Design a fantasy RPG visual theme with medieval-inspired UI, mystical color palette (emerald greens, deep purples, gold accents), ornate borders, and atmospheric typography that evokes magic and adventure
acceptanceCriteria: UI components use consistent fantasy RPG aesthetic
Color scheme reflects magical and heroic themes
Typography is legible and thematically appropriate
Layout supports immersive gaming experience

requirements.text: Render all generated images (fantasy environment backgrounds, character race illustrations, class icons, UI decorative elements) as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: All generated images load from public assets folder
Images are optimized for web display
Fallback handling exists for missing images

constraints: Must use Motoko for backend with single-actor architecture
Must use React with TypeScript for frontend
Must use React Three Fiber for 3D world rendering
Must use Internet Identity for authentication
Cannot integrate third-party social media APIs
Cannot use external databases or cloud providers
All multiplayer features must work within Internet Computer constraints
nonGoals: Integration with external social media platforms for marketing
Integration with external payment processors beyond Stripe
Mobile app store deployment and optimization
